name: 血腥之日228-Vampire Martina-Bloody Day 2.28
description:
The game is created by RPG Maker VX Ace, a 2D side-scrolling PC action game with 228 events. You will control the vampire Martina against the armed forces of the Republic of China for Taiwan's independence!

Guide：

【Story Mode】
＜Keyboard＞
Enter、ESC、C、X：Confirm
Shift：Expand the current article
Ctrl：Fast forward
A：Log

＜Gamepad＞
X：Confirm
B：Cancel
R1：Expand the current article
R2：Fast forward
Y：Log


【Battle Mode】
The following keys are the default, can be changed in the KeyConfig inside Optin.



＜Keyboard＞
Arrow keys：move、jump
ATK：General attack
SK︰Heavy attack
SP：Final attack
DEF：Defense
FD：Use item

＜Gamepad＞
X：General attack
A︰Heavy attack
Y：Final attack
B：Defense
L1：Use item

※General attack、Heavy attack、Final attack and Defense can be paired with arrow keys to make different actions.


＜Special Actions＞
Pursuit、emergency dodge：during attack + →→or←←or↑↑
